description.narrative: By 2022, the national statistical system will have strengthened its capacity to generate data and analytical evidence regarding the situation of children and adolescent., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Evaluation And Research, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022 the most vulnerable children and adolescents, and especially girls, will have access to public policies and programmes that promote social inclusion and are supported by Dominican society

mailing-address.narrative: Avenida Anacaona No.9 Casa de Naciones Unidas 3er. piso Mirador Sur Santo Domingo

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
